name: Tukki & Champ
description:
Tukki the toucan and Champ the chameleon are bored, and really hungry.
Play locally against a friend as either Tukki or Champ, and try to gather more food than your opponent.



As Tukki you can fly around the screen in little jumps, and are in turn the only one
capable of moving. This means you control where Champ is as well. Try to force Champ
into missing his shots while getting closer to the bugs to grab them for yourself.



As Champ you can shoot out your tongue to catch bugs. Aim at an insect and shoot when
Tukki least expects it. Move your tongue in mid-air to counteract Tukki’s attempts of
out-maneuvering you.
